The ACLU of Georgia's successes were featured on the front page of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution.

Dear ##first_name[ACLU Supporter]##,

Last week, I addressed my second ACLU of Georgia Annual Meeting as your executive director. This has been a productive year. So productive, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution took note and published a front page article this week: Read the article on our website.

Your support and engagement made the difference.

This was a team effort, with the critical contributions from our coalition partners and the team at the ACLU of Georgia, especially our lobbyist, Chris Bruce; Political Director, Burrell Ellis; Communications Director, Ana Maria Rosato; as well as Legal Director, Sean Young.

With your support, we will continue to fight to protect and extend civil rights and civil liberties. We will use all the tools we have — litigation, legislation, community education, communications, advocacy and voter mobilization — to create a more perfect union.

Please sign up for People Power to continue supporting the ACLU of Georgia.

Sincerely,

Andrea Young
Executive Director
